snippet.title: The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon Trailer HD
snippet.description:
Activision's upcoming and final Legend of Legend of Spyro game, Dawn of the Dragon. It offers single free-fly play and co-op play.

Releases in NA at October 28,2008.
